name: Riot Relief
description:
Selection and movement guide: A single officer can be selected by clicking them with the left mouse button. Multiple can be selected by clicking and dragging over the area of officers that you want to select. To move officers you can click the right mouse button to align them vertically/their last rotation, or you can hold down the right mouse button and angle them in the direction that you want.

Riot Relief is a riot/protest simulator where you can purchase officers, vehicles, and equipment in order to protect an important objective from aggressive individuals breaking the law.

*Please note that this game is early in development with many know bugs. It is a demo, so expect the main version of the game to release in May, 2022.
